Name: Infested Terran
Description: An Infested Terran does moderate damage and lasts for 30 seconds.**Can attack ground and air units**

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Returns the unit to the surface.
Root.Name: Unburrow

Root.Tooltip: Buries the unit underground. Burrowed units are unable to move or attack, but they cannot be seen without detection.
Root.Name: Burrow
